content: भेषज {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भेषं रोगभयं जयति जि-ड <ls>Tv.</ls>] Making well or healthy, curative. --जं {@--1@} A medicine, medicament, or drug; नरानंब त्रातुं त्वमिह परमं भेषजमसि <ls>G. L. 15</ls>; अतिवीर्यवतीव भेषजे बहुरल्पीयसि दृश्यते गुणः <ls>Ki. 2. 4.</ls> {@--2@} A remedy or cure in general. {@--3@} A kind of fennel. {@--4@} Any spell against diseases. {@--5@} Water (<ab>Ved.</ab>).
